text: Tennis at the 2015 Island Games was held at the Caesarean Tennis Club, Jersey from 28 June to 3 July. == Medal Table == == Results == {| |- | Rowspan=2| Men’s singles | Rowspan=2| | Rowspan=2| | |- | |- | Rowspan=2| Men’s doubles | Rowspan=2| Scott Clayton James Connelly | Rowspan=2| Dominic McLuskey Patrick Ogier | Björn Carlnäs Karl Lindberg |- | Jeremy Cross Stuart Parker |- | Rowspan=2| Women’s singles | Rowspan=2| | Rowspan=2| | |- | |- | Rowspan=2| Women's doubles | Rowspan=2| Karen Faragher Laura Feely | Rowspan=2| Clare Clarke Rebecca Edwards | Natasha Forrest Eva Hurst |- | Pauline Nordlund Malin Ringbom |- | Rowspan=2| Mixed doubles | Rowspan=2| Ella Taylor Rob West | Rowspan=2| Karen Faragher Bruce Wagstaff | Alec Arho Havrén Tzvetelina Havrén |- | Peter Forsström Malin Ringbom |- | Rowspan=2| Men's Team | Rowspan=2| Scott Clayton James Connelly James Faudemer Stuart Parker | Rowspan=2| Marc Chinn Billy Harris Jack Hedges Bruce Wagstaff | Dan Andersson Otto Byman Peter Forsström Tim Schauman |- | Dominic McLuskey Patrick Ogier Nico Robinson Rob West |- | Rowspan=2| Women's Team | Rowspan=2| Georgina Denton Joanna Dyer Chantelle Frith Ella Taylor | Rowspan=2| Clare Clarke Rebecca Edwards Natasha Forrest Eva Hurst | flagathlete| Karen Faragher Laura Feely Katie Harris Hannah Snidal |- | Millie Coombes Reegan Greenwood |- |} == References == Category:2015 Island Games Island
